this_title: Jean Eustache - Interview - 'La maman et la putain' (Cannes)
introduction: Interview with Jean Eustache, which recounts the genesis of his film "The Mother and the Whore". Bernadette Lafont, Jean-Pierre Léaud and Françoise Lebrun speak about their work with the director.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=97v7wJz6IQI
